BC.Game Online Casino

BC.Game online casino and sportsbook opened in 2017. Ever since then, it has been growing in popularity among players who prefer cryptocurrency for gambling. BC.Game accepts about 100 types of digital money, including BTC, Ethereum, XRP, EOS, TRX, and USDT as well as traditional fiat money options. There are thousands of exciting games and card tables in regular and live modes.

Generous bonuses are offered to those who want to increase their capital by making deposits:

  • up to 1,000 welcome coins for newbies;
  • Wheel of Fortune with the top prize of 1 bitcoin;
  • daily quests and challenges for rewards;
  • in-game points and tokens.

BC.Game bonus codes help gamblers replenish their reserves and get bigger and more frequent wins. Moreover, they can do it all on a well-optimized mobile app.

Is BC.Game legit?

BC.Game is an absolutely legit website and company. We have played and withdrawn all our earnings BTC.

BC.Game is a fully decentralized, smart contract driven casino platform that neglects manipulation by centralized authorities or a third party.

The platform has over 1013 reviews on TrustPilot with an average rating of 3.8. You can easily leave your review about BC.Game here !

BC.Game is one of many websites that digitized their operations. However, the platform went a step higher using technology, decisively embracing cryptocurrencies and offering a diversity of a wide range of games such as Wheel Baccarat, Plinko, Crash, Roulette, HashDice, Blackjack, Keno and others.

BC.Game: Crypto Casino Games & Casino Slot Games

Cryptocurrencies are based on mathematics. They are accessible and their underlying blockchains are secure and active. By using cryptocurrencies as settlement, BC.Game bypassed the need to require its customers to register bank accounts and be approved.

Anyone, anywhere in the world, can register and play any of the 15+ unique games by depositing the 25+ cryptocurrencies, including BTC, LINK, UNI and more.

The casino is built on the Ethereum blockchain. BC.Game offers ‘provable equity guaranteed’ as all transactions are stored on the public Ethereum blockchain and are completely transparent. Anyone can check transactions and verify them.

As mentioned above, the online casino integrates technology, offering the best deals for players while remaining transparent. Interestingly, the gaming platform was formed in 2017 and is fully verified by the Crypto gambling Foundation.

Since then, it has managed to grab a market share. Part of its superiority is its business model and the integration of blockchain technology that ensures fast settlement of transactions, quick refund of winnings and transparent operations that every participant can track, regardless of their physical location.

BC.Game’s website interface is user-friendly and very attractive. Players from all corners of the world can test their skills and luck. There is a built-in chat room to the right of the casino homepage where players can chat with other players. The casino awards random prizes to players based on their chat activities which encourages everyone to contribute and stay active.

BC.Game offers 16 casino games, including Roulette, Blackjack, Video Poker and Wheel, to name a few. The house edge ranges from 1% to 2.7% depending on the game. The processing speed of the game engine is fast and players never feel a lag.

Popular Games at BC.Game

HiLo

While BC.Game has a huge number of games available on its website, one of its more renowned and popular game modes has to be HiLo. The game follows its standard rules and you’ll be guessing whether the next card that shows up will be higher or lower than its previous card. If you’re correct, you’re able to multiply your winnings.

Sweet Bonanza Candyland

This game is a wheel of fortune, and you’ll have to place your bet and wait for your number to win. Multipliers can be anywhere from 1x to 10x and you’ll even get some bonus rounds in there.

Dog House

Before we get into the rules of the game, you need to know that the Dog House is a colorful and enjoyable game in and on its own. It is a 5-reel and 3-row slot game with 20 paylines and RTP of 96.51%. Should you manage to land three bonus symbols, you’ll be able to get a free spin round and sticky will be there until the round ends.

Sportsbook

BC.Game has since then added a sports category to its website. The platform offers betting options for over 30+ different games. There’s a category for eSports as well with popular game titles like Counter-Strike, DOTA 2, and League of Legends. Players can find all upcoming and popular matches on the main page with a betslip displaying their bets in the bottom left corner.

BC.Game Promotional and bonus offers

BC.Game offers multiple bonuses and promotional offers for its users. Users can also earn by sharing their affiliate link and inviting new players to the casino. The bonus offers are divided into different categories as follows: task bonus, daily bonus, rakeback, reload, level up bonus, to name a few.

Below is a brief description of the bonuses to help us understand them better:

  • 🎁 Task Bonus: Users can complete the given task and earn the rewards.
  • 🎁 Master Medal: Here, you must collect medals to earn delicious rewards. With 20 medals in your possession, you will be rewarded with 10000 BCD which equals $10000.
  • 🎁 Crap Codes: These are bonus codes that can be redeemed when you enter ShitCodes on the BC.Game bonus page.
  • 🎁 Daily Bonus: Promotions in Daily Bonus include;

Roll Competition: here, you can spin a wheel of fortune to win a star prize. The Roll Competition is a daily event that all players above VIP Club 3 are entitled to play only once a day.

Where is COCO: COCO appears randomly on the BC.Game site (usually at an interval of 6 hours) and if you are lucky enough to click on COCO when it appears, you will get a juicy reward.

Deposit / Welcome Bonus

BC.Game gives you the opportunity to win some of the following deposit bonuses for your first four deposits:

1. Initial Deposit (Bonus of up to 270%) 🔴 🟠 🟡

  • ✔️ You can receive an 120% bonus on deposits of $30 to $80.
  • ✔️ You are eligible for a 150% bonus on deposits of $80-$400.
  • ✔️ You are qualified for a 270% bonus on deposits of $400 or more.

2. Second Deposit (Bonus of up to 300%) 🔴 🟠 🟡

  • ✔️ You can receive a 150% bonus on deposits between $60 and $120.
  • ✔️ You are qualified for a 225% bonus on deposits between $12 and $600.
  • ✔️ You can receive a 300% BC.Game bonus on deposits of $600 or more.

3. Third Deposit (Bonus of up to 330%) 🔴 🟠 🟡

  • ✔️ You can receive a 150% bonus on deposits of $120-$300.
  • ✔️ You are entitled to a 225% bonus on deposits of $300 to $1500.
  • ✔️ You can get a 330% bonus on deposits of $1500 and more.

4. Fourth Deposit (Bonus of up to 360%) 🔴 🟠 🟡

  • ✔️ You can receive a 150% bonus on deposits of $150 to $400.
  • ✔️ You can receive a 225% bonus on deposits of $400 to $3000.
  • ✔️ Those that deposit $3000 or more are eligible for a 360% bonus.

How Will I Receive the Deposit Bonus?

After making the deposit with one of the valid amounts mentioned above, the additional bonus amount will automatically be deposited to your account in BCD. You can use it in any of the games available on the BC.Game platform.

Lucky prize on BC.Game

Chat rain: the chatbot randomly gives a reward to 6 players. The bot selects random winners based on chat activity. This bot usually appears every six hours, so make sure you are actively playing crypto games on the BC.Game site for a chance to win this lucky prize. Make sure you’re actively participating in the chat room as well with the rest of the community.

Rakeback on BC.Game

Rakeback is available to players above VIP Club 14. The process goes like this:

  • Level 14-21 will get 5% of the house edge
  • Level 22-29 will get 7% of the house edge
  • Level 30-37 will get 10% of the house edge
  • Level 38 and above will get 15% of the house edge

You can calculate your rakeback using the formula below:

Rakeback = Wager * 1% * (% according to the level mentioned above)

Recharging on BC.Game

Recharging means that you’ll be able to acquire split BC.Game bonuses for the week in different intervals. However, claiming these will need you to be a VIP level 22, having bet a minimum of $1,000 within the last week (7 days).

To claim recharge, simply go to the recharge icon by opening the dashboard and hitting claim. You can cancel it whenever it suits you. You can collect it daily, hourly or in 10 minute durations, that’s entirely up to you.

Vault Pro on BC.Game

The Vault Pro is a unique feature that acts like a vault or bank for you to store your coins. Not only can you store your funds safely, but you also earn a lucrative interest paid to you daily! That’s certainly a plus point that many love!

  • You can choose from a total of 13 coin pairs.
  • There is a minimum deposit amount that you can check under the ‘Deposit Minimum’ option.
  • Withdrawals will go through an automatic process that will check for everything and may take a few minutes.
